verses.content: “Bâwngchal amanih, berâm amanih, demkâi le ṭhat nawna hrim hrim nei chun LALPA in Pathien kuomah in inthâwi ding a ni nawh; chu chu LALPA in Pathien ta dingin thil tirdakum a ni sih a.
Nangni laia LALPA in Pathienin a pêk cheu in umna khâwlai khawm, pasal amanih, nuhmei amani khawm, thuthlung bawse a, LALPA in Pathien mithmua thil ṭha naw thaw an um a,
Pathien dang rawng va bâwl a, ka thupêk ni lo, nisa amanih, thla amanih, vâna mi hrim hrim bie an um a, an hril che a,
nangin i lo hriet a, ṭhahnem- ngaitaka în dawn a; a lo indik ngeia, thu chu a chieng faka, chuong anga thil tirdakum Israel mihai laia thaw a lo ni chun,
chu thil suol thawtu, pasal ama- nih, nuhmei amani ngei chu ṭhuoi suok in ta, lungin in dêng hlum ding a nih.
Hretu pahni amanih, pathum amani bâua inthawkin thi ding chu sukhlum ding a nih, hretu pakhat chau bâua inthawk chun sukhlum ding a ni nawh.
Sukhlumna dinga chun hretuhai chun kut thlâk hmasâng an ta, chu hnungah mipui po poin. Chuong ang chun nangni laia inthawkin thil ṭha naw chu in sukbo ding a nih.
“Inthat thua dâm, sum le pai thua dâm, invuok thua dâm, in umnaa inkhingna thu hrim hrima dâm in ta dinga rêl intak taluo a hung um chun, LALPA in Pathienin hmun a la ruot dinga chun fêng in ta,
chu huna thiempu Levi mi le rorêltuhai kuoma chun fêng in ta, anni râwn in ta; chun, anni chun thu sukthlûk dân ding an lo khîkhmu ding cheu a nih.
LALPAIN hmun a la ruot dinga inthawka thu sukthlûk dân ding an lo khîkhmu ang cheu chun thâwng in ta, an inchûktir ang pei cheu chun fîmkhurtakin in thaw ding a nih.
An thu tlûkna an lo khîkhmu cheu chun changtienga manih, vawi- tienga manih in pêtsan ding a ni nawh.
LALPA in Pathien hmaa rawng- bâwla ṭhang hlak thiempu le rorêltu thu pawm loa, thawlui taphawt, chu mi chu sukhlum ding a nih, Israelhai laia inthawkin, chu thil ṭha naw chu in sukbo ding a nih.
Chuongchun, mi po poin hrieng an ta, ṭîng an ta, thawlui nâwk ta naw ni hai.
“LALPA in Pathienin ram a pêk cheu chu in va tlung a, in va hluo a, in va um a, ‘Ei vêla hnam po po ang bawkin lal nei ei tiu,’ in ti pha chun;
LALPA in Pathienin a ithlang ngei chu lalah in nei ding a nih; in unau laia mi pakhat lalah in siem ding a nih; hnam dang mi, in unau ni lo chu nangni awptu dingin in siem ding a ni nawh.

Amiruokchu, sakawr a hau ding a ni nawh, sakawr a hau theina dingin Aigupta mihai le chun inthu- ruol ding a ni bawk nawh. LALPA chun, ‘Tuta chen chu, chu tienga chun in kîr nâwk ding a ni ta nawh,’ a ti tlat sih a.
Chuong naw chun a lungril invâkhmang rawi a tih. Nuhmei khawm a hau ding a ni nawh a, tangka le rângkachak khawm a hau bawk ding a ni nawh.
Chun, a ram lalṭhungphaa a ṭhung pha khawm thiempu Levi mihai kawl hlak dân hi lekhabuah inziek sâwngtir a ta,
kawl a ta, a dam sûng chun a tiem rawp hlak ding a nih, hieng dân le hieng thuruothai po po hi pawma, zâwma thaw dinga LALPA a Pathien ṭi dân ân chûk theina dingin;
a lungril a unauhai chungah ân sie sâng nawna dingin le changtienga manih, vawitienga manih thupêk chu a pêtsan nawna ding le Israelhai lai chun ama le a thlahai a rama hin an dam sâwt phâna dingin.
